channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Life on Mars? NASA says a rock sample shows potential signs of ancient life
item.description: Ancient organisms may have left microscopic "biosignatures" on Mars. That's according to NASA scientists, who say a rock sample offers the most concre...

item.title: Israel's attacks on Hamas in Qatar stun the Gulf and dash chances for a Gaza ceasefire
item.description: Qatar slams Israeli attacks on Hamas leaders in Doha as "state terrorism" after the bombardment rocks the tiny U.S. ally and dashes hopes of a ceasefi...

item.title: Trump makes a rare D.C. restaurant visit to tout his federal crackdown on crime

item.title: An election law expert weighs in on Trump's effort to reshape our democracy
item.description: Before 2026's midterms, President Trump wants to ban mail-in ballots and electronic voting machines, and change voting rules. Legal expert Richard Has...

item.title: Trump says right-wing activist Charlie Kirk has died after shooting

item.title: Charlie Kirk, influential voice for young conservatives, killed at 31
item.description: Charlie Kirk died Wednesday after he was shot in the neck while speaking at an event at Utah Valley University.

item.title: Poland says it shot down Russian drones after airspace violation
item.description: Nato jets were deployed to respond to drones that entered Polish airspace during Russian strikes on Ukraine.

item.title: Charlie Kirk, who helped build support for Trump among young people, dies after campus shooting
Accidental or deliberate? Russia's drone incursion into Poland is a test for Nato
item.description: Whether the drone incursion was deliberate or accidental, Moscow will be watching Nato's response to it closely.

item.title: Putin and Netanyahu present twin challenges to Trump's diplomacy

item.title: 'Netanyahu, we're not leaving': Defiance in Gaza City as Israel shows aid sites planned for evacuees
item.description: As Israel insists the whole population of Gaza City must leave, the BBC visits new aid sites the army claims will help them.

item.title: Photos from Utah Valley University before and after the shooting of Charlie Kirk
Who was Charlie Kirk, the conservative youth organiser and Trump ally?
item.description: Kirk, an influential Trump ally who at age 18 set up Turning Point USA, died in a shooting while speaking at a Utah campus event.
